item.title: Scheme Regex literals in Emacs
item.description: LIPS Scheme support regular expression literals, but it's not the only one implementation that
item.content:encoded:
LIPS Scheme support regular expression literals, but it's not the only one implementation that support those. Other implementation includes Gauche and Kawa.

Unfortunetlly, you can't easily use those regular expressions in GNU Emacs, my main editor of choice.


see the rest of the article

item.title: LIPS History
item.description: This is the first article on LIPS blog. In this article I will write about the history of LIPS
item.content:encoded:
This is the first article on LIPS blog. In this article I will write about the history of LIPS Scheme interpreter.
